alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 12:44AM CDT until July 15 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Western Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1243 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pine Bluff to 7 miles south of White Hall to 7 miles west of Lamont, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Fordyce... Star City... Rison... White Hall... Altheimer... Kingsland... Thornton... Whitefield... Plantersville... Tipton... Herbine... Nebo... Feenyville... Ellisville... Lamont... Cottondale... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Hebron... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln
